mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.assigned_teacher_id AS assignedTeacherId, u.real_name AS assignedTeacherName, c.create_time AS createTime, c.academic_year AS academicYear, c.semester AS semester, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM biz_teaching_class_student s WHERE s.class_id = c.id) AS studentCount FROM biz_teaching_class c LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id = c.assigned_teacher_id WHERE c.subject_id = #{courseId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC, c.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_teaching_class (subject_id, name, assigned_teacher_id, academic_year, semester) VALUES (#{courseId}, #{name}, #{assignedTeacherId}, #{academicYear}, #{semester})
mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS id, COALESCE(s.real_name, u.real_name) AS name, s.student_no AS studentNo, COALESCE(o.name, bc.class_name) AS adminClassName FROM biz_teaching_class_student tcs JOIN users u ON u.id = tcs.user_id LEFT JOIN biz_student s ON s.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN biz_class bc ON bc.id = s.class_id LEFT JOIN sys_organization o ON o.id = s.class_id AND o.type = 'class' WHERE tcs.class_id = #{classId} ORDER BY u.real_name ASC, u.id ASC

SELECT DISTINCT s.id AS id, s.name AS name, s.code AS code FROM biz_teaching_class_student tcs JOIN biz_teaching_class tc ON tc.id = tcs.class_id JOIN biz_subject s ON s.id = tc.subject_id WHERE tcs.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY s.name ASC, s.id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO biz_teaching_class_student (class_id, user_id) VALUES (#{classId}, #{userId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM biz_teaching_class_student WHERE class_id = #{classId} AND user_id = #{userId}
